participant_1.background:
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I treasure my ability to swim.
i eat well.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
I love my spouse for being understanding about my phobia.

participant_2.background:
My cats are my best friends.
I remember playing guitar with my friends in my basement for hours.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
my favorite band is pearl jam.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I am doing well too, thanks! What are your hobbies?
I enjoy reading novels, exploring new areas, playing guitar, and spending time with my cats.
Those all sound like fun hobbies! I love to read as well, and I am trying to learn to play the guitar. I also love to spend time with my pets.
That's great! I have been playing guitar for about 10 years now, and it's one of my favorite things to do. What kind of music do you like to read?
I enjoy reading a variety of genres, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries. What kind of music do you like to play?
I mostly play rock music, but I also enjoy playing blues and folk music. I love the energy of rock music, and I find that it's a great way to express myself.
That's great! I love the energy of rock music as well. I'm not very good at playing it, but I enjoy it nonetheless.
It's never too late to learn! I would be happy to teach you some basic chords if you'd like.
That would be great! I would love to learn more about playing guitar.
Sounds good! I'll bring my guitar next time we meet up.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
